description:
The inclusion of Hulu titles to Disney Plus has allowed the streaming service to offer more varied genres of content. In addition to traditional family-friendly fare, subscribers can also find R-rated titles and many of which were acquired from the 20th Century Fox library. Now one such R-rated horror movie from Disney’s 20th Century Studios [...]

The post Surprising R-Rated Horror Movie Trending On Disney Plus appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Surprising R-Rated Horror Movie Trending On Disney Plus
